the unofficial McKague Year 2000 calendar...

This has been a lot of fun to put together. We've tried to include pictures from all branches of the family. Please forgive any omissions. Let us know if we should continue this next year, or whether once was enough. We had hundreds (well, thousands) of pictures to choose from and simply chose those that seemed as if they would work well for the project. Remember, we can always use more photos. You should be able to download these pages and print them if you are so inclined. We had to play with the sizing a little to accomodate some graphics programs. Best wishes.
